if pflds
   if pflds[:q] =~ /fieldcodes$/ or pflds[:sio_code] =~ /fieldcodes$/
      if pflds[:code_to_name_oper] =~ /add/  or pflds[:classname] =~ /_add_/
          a=  plsql.r_pobjects.first("where pobject_code = '#{pflds[:pobject_code_fld]}' and pobject_objecttype = 'tbl_field'  and pobject_expiredate > sysdate")
          if a.nil?
                    @screen_code = "r_pobjects"
	                command_c = init_from_screen pflds
                    command_c[:pobject_code] = pflds[:pobject_code_fld]
                    command_c[:pobject_expiredate] = pflds[:fieldcode_expiredate]||="2099/12/31"
                    command_c[:pobject_objecttype] = "tbl_field"
                    command_c[:sio_session_counter] =   user_seq_nextval(command_c[:sio_user_code])    ##
                    command_c[:sio_classname] = "plsql_auto_add_by_fieldcodes"
                    command_c[:id] = command_c[:pobject_id] = plsql.pobjects_seq.nextval 
                    sub_insert_sio_c    command_c 
                    sub_userproc_insert command_c
                    plsql.commit
                    dbcud = DbCud.new
                    dbcud.perform(command_c[:sio_session_counter],command_c[:sio_user_code])
                    chkcnt = 0
                    while chkcnt <10
                        sleep 0.1
                        a = plsql.r_pobjects.first("where pobject_code = '#{pflds[:pobject_cod_fld]}' and pobject_objecttype = 'tbl_field'  and pobject_expiredate > sysdate")
                        break if a
                        chkcnt += 1
                    end
        end
	  end
   end
end
